Translations.Text: qul a-unabbi-ukum bikhayrin min dhalikum lilladhina ittaqaw ʿinda rabbihim jannatun tajri min tahtiha l-anharu khalidina fiha wa-azwajun mutahharatun warid'wanun mina l-lahi wal-lahu basirun bil-ʿibadi
alladhina yaquluna rabbana innana amanna fa-igh'fir lana dhunubana waqina ʿadhaba l-nari
al-sabirina wal-sadiqina wal-qanitina wal-munfiqina wal-mus'taghfirina bil-ashari
shahida l-lahu annahu la ilaha illa huwa wal-malaikatu wa-ulu l-ʿil'mi qaiman bil-qis'ti la ilaha illa huwa l-ʿazizu l-hakimu
inna l-dina ʿinda l-lahi l-is'lamu wama ikh'talafa alladhina utu l-kitaba illa min baʿdi ma jaahumu l-ʿil'mu baghyan baynahum waman yakfur biayati l-lahi fa-inna l-laha sariʿu l-hisabi

fa-in hajjuka faqul aslamtu wajhiya lillahi wamani ittabaʿani waqul lilladhina utu l-kitaba wal-umiyina a-aslamtum fa-in aslamu faqadi ih'tadaw wa-in tawallaw fa-innama ʿalayka l-balaghu wal-lahu basirun bil-ʿibadi
inna alladhina yakfuruna biayati l-lahi wayaqtuluna l-nabiyina bighayri haqqin wayaqtuluna alladhina yamuruna bil-qis'ti mina l-nasi fabashir'hum biʿadhabin alimin
ulaika alladhina habitat aʿmaluhum fi l-dun'ya wal-akhirati wama lahum min nasirina
alam tara ila alladhina utu nasiban mina l-kitabi yud'ʿawna ila kitabi l-lahi liyahkuma baynahum thumma yatawalla fariqun min'hum wahum muʿ'riduna
dhalika bi-annahum qalu lan tamassana l-naru illa ayyaman maʿdudatin wagharrahum fi dinihim ma kanu yaftaruna
fakayfa idha jamaʿnahum liyawmin la rayba fihi wawuffiyat kullu nafsin ma kasabat wahum la yuz'lamuna
quli l-lahuma malika l-mul'ki tu'ti l-mul'ka man tashau watanziʿu l-mul'ka mimman tashau watuʿizzu man tashau watudhillu man tashau biyadika l-khayru innaka ʿala kulli shayin qadirun
tuliju al-layla fi l-nahari watuliju l-nahara fi al-layli watukh'riju l-haya mina l-mayiti watukh'riju l-mayita mina l-hayi watarzuqu man tashau bighayri hisabin

la yattakhidhi l-mu'minuna l-kafirina awliyaa min duni l-mu'minina waman yafʿal dhalika falaysa mina l-lahi fi shayin illa an tattaqu min'hum tuqatan wayuhadhirukumu l-lahu nafsahu wa-ila l-lahi l-masiru
qul in tukh'fu ma fi sudurikum aw tub'duhu yaʿlamhu l-lahu wayaʿlamu ma fi l-samawati wama fi l-ardi wal-lahu ʿala kulli shayin qadirun
yawma tajidu kullu nafsin ma ʿamilat min khayrin muh'daran wama ʿamilat min suin tawaddu law anna baynaha wabaynahu amadan baʿidan wayuhadhirukumu l-lahu nafsahu wal-lahu raufun bil-ʿibadi
qul in kuntum tuhibbuna l-laha fa-ittabiʿuni yuh'bib'kumu l-lahu wayaghfir lakum dhunubakum wal-lahu ghafurun rahimun
qul atiʿu l-laha wal-rasula fa-in tawallaw fa-inna l-laha la yuhibbu l-kafirina
